detail_desc: V-neck jumper in a soft, fine-knit merino wool blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini top with mesh and a knot at the front. No fasteners.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and pockets in the side seams.
Fitted top in airy jersey made from a silk and cotton blend. Round neck with narrow ribbing and extra-long sleeves.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fancy dress costume in woven fabric with a print motif and a matching helmet. Costume with a stand-up collar with a padded edge, zip down the front, plastic fastener at the front of the waist and elastication at the back. Ribbed cuffs and elasticated hems. Helmet with a hook and loop fastener at the front.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with a decorative bow on the front.
Short, A-line skirt with buttons down the front.
V-neck T-shirt in cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in a viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and fluted soles. Heel 1 cm.
Cotton twill shorts with an adjustable elasticated waist, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and a zip fly with a button.
Fitted maxi dress in a rib-knit cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and gentle flare to the hem. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey in a straight cut with high slits in the sides.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, A-line skirt in cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck and decorative buttons down the front.

Jumpsuit woven in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, zip fly, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Wide, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded edge and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details. Pile linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainers in a cotton weave with lacing at the front, soft insoles and fluted soles.

Ultralight running top in fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and a back in ventilating mesh. Flatlock seams and reflective details. Rounded, slightly longer hem at the back. Weight is 123 g in size M.
Cycling shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Set with a zip-through hoodie, top and joggers in soft, organic cotton. Long-sleeved, zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Long-sleeved top in jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in a premium cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Earrings in various designs in metal with sparkly stones. Size 0.4-2 cm.
Round-necked vest tops in soft jersey made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt jacket in soft, felted fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Open jacket in airy, crinkled viscose with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Shopper in suede with two handles at the top, one with a decorative tassel. Size 14x28x30 cm.
Swimsuit with flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and join at the back. Lined front.
Long-sleeved top in pile lined with soft fleece. Hood with a wrapover front, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in a patterned weave with a concealed zip at the front and a detachable belt with a buckle at the waist. Unlined.
Sweatpants in organic cotton jersey with elastication at the waist and hems. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck knitted jumper with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Swim shorts in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with an elasticated, drawstring waist. Discreet side pockets and a flap back pocket with a hook and loop fastening and small metal eyelet. Short slits in the sides of the hems. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Hooded sports top in airy, fast-drying jersey with raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a drawstring at the hem.
Shirt in a soft, airy, cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, an open chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Straight, slightly wider fit with a gently rounded hem.
Calf-length, flared skirt in a patterned weave with a concealed zip in one side. The polyester content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt in soft cotton twill with front pockets and fake welt back pockets.
V-neck kaftan in a viscose weave with airy sections and a slight sheen. Fringing at the hem.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Shorts in woven fabric. High paper bag waist with covered elastication.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative frill over the shoulders.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Vest tops in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Lace briefs with an elasticated trim at the waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fine-knit top in a soft cotton blend with 3/4-length sleeves.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Large bucket bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and drawstring at the top. Unlined. Size approx. 15x29.5x31.5 cm.
Short shorts in soft viscose jersey with side pockets and wide elasticated smocking at the top for best fit over the tummy.

Casual, easy pull on joggers in lightweight, washed cotton twill. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Sleeveless slub jersey top in a modal and cotton blend with decorative gathers on one shoulder and a tie detail at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Slim-fit chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist. Zip fly, side pockets, fake back pockets and narrow hems.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.

Pull-on trousers in washed cotton twill. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, low crotch and diagonal side pockets. Legs with shaping darts at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.

Trousers in rustle-weave nylon with covered elastication at the back of the waist, a zip fly and press-stud and low crotch. Back and leg pockets with a flap and press-studs, diagonal side pockets and an elastic drawstring at the hems.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and gathered seam down the back and sleeves. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Socks in a soft, fine knit containing some wool and glittery threads.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Blouse in fluted fabric made from a cotton and viscose blend with a collar, V-shaped opening at the front, wrapover front with a concealed press-stud, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back.
Short shorts in an airy cotton weave with an embroidered pattern. Covered elastication at the waist and scalloped edges with broderie anglaise at the hems. Unlined.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Headband knitted in soft cashmere with a wrapover front.
Nursing dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and wrapover top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Elasticated seam at the waist with a tie. Unlined.
Top in soft, printed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
